column6: The MARVEL KNIGHTS HULK era begins with a self-contained prologue to a 4-part story arc, introducing a mysterious young man who just might hold the key to Bruce Banner - and the Hulk's - future. Then in HULK #71, the Hulk goes toe-to-toe with IRON MAN in a classic super hero showdown! 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.25 (each)
